result.title: Correlation between user rating and contribution
result.content:
After reading the topic by E869120, I feel it would be very interesting to check the correlation between rating and contribution. So I tried to calculate it.

The process of my calculation

  • Call the codeforces API user.ratedList to get a list of all rated users.
  • Call the API user.info to get the contribution info. The API documentation said the number of user handles can be up to 10000. However, it seems due to the restriction of nginx, even 1000 handles at a time failed because the URL was too long. So this step took longer time than I thought.
  • Import the data to LibreOffice Calc, and use the data process function to figure out the correlation between variables.

The data I posted is based on all rated users with non-zero contribution. Here is a chart for a general view:

As the following image showed, the correlation is 0.48136, which means a obvious positive correlation between the two variables.

I'm not sure if this calculation is very scientific, as it seems both the rating and contribution are non-liner functions. If you have better idea, please let me know.
